ThingDef.label: cystoid nest
ThingDef.description: A thin nest-like structure which contains and produces cystoid typhon.

FactionDef.Name: TyphonFaction
FactionDef.label: typhon
FactionDef.description: The Typhon creatures are strange psychic beings from another world. Not much is known about them, as not many live to tell the tale.

HediffDef.label: creates weaver
HediffDef.description: This typhon is attempting to transform into a weaver.

HediffDef.label: mind controlled
HediffDef.description: This pawn is mindcontrolled by a typhon.

IncidentDef.label: mimic Crash
IncidentDef.letterText: A transport pod seems to be crashing nearby, with an anusual black creature, gripping it as it falls through the atmosphere.

IncidentDef.label: typhon herd
IncidentDef.letterText: Typhon have wandered into the map.

ThingDef.label: Typhon Organ
ThingDef.description: An organ harvvested from a Typhon. These organs are full of an exotic material commonly used in the manufacturing of Skilltrainers.

JobDef.reportString: Learning a valuable lesson about telepaths

ThingDef.Name: TyphonThingMimic
ThingDef.label: mimic
ThingDef.description: The first type of Typhon ever encountered by human life, these small agile creatures possess the ability to shape-shift into almost every single object, from small to medium sizes. How they do it is still up for debate but for all we know their organs and matter are quite valuable in the rim due to it's use in creating Neuro and Psytrainers. Still, for their size they can be dangerous so caution is adviced.

ThingDef.label: weaver
ThingDef.description: What's known about this Typhon is how it's been seen to create these strand like essence, Coral; weaving it into beautiful looking fields of yellow almost transparent strings, hence the name. Cystoids have been noted to be around this Typhon while it's also seen to emit a shield-like field around itself that projects unnerving thoughts into a weak-minded individuals head, causing them to tremble or flee from fear. One last observation spotted is their ability to create Typhon with a humanoid figure from bodies of dead or unconcious people and the ability to create other forms of Typhon from the Mimics. Word of advice: make sure you stop them from doing so and exercise caution.

ThingDef.label: phantom
ThingDef.description: Typhon taking the shape of a tall humanoid figure, Phantoms are what you get when a Weaver gets a hold of a dead or unconcious human body. Having the ability to zip and teleport short distances and project psychic pulses of energy towards foes from afar, these nimble Typhon can be deadly even on their own. Extreme caution is advised.

ThingDef.label: cystoid
ThingDef.description: Lesser species of Typhon known to accumulate in nests and seen to spawn from the Weavers. Not much of a threat on their own but can overwhelm one with their numbers. Extremely volatile and explodes upon contact with any moving object, caution adviced when dealing with groups.

ThingDef.label: telepath
ThingDef.description: Typhon with almost no discernable figure, a mass of tentacles, and a single glowing eye. Some say just looking at it can be unnerving. Telepaths have been shown to have immense psychic ability, causing mental harm to pawns and even bending them to the telepaths will.

RecipeDef.Name: TyphonSkilltrainerRecipeBase
RecipeDef.description: Make skilltrainer from typhon organs and advanced components.
